all about me

I am a BSIT student studying about programming here in the Philippines. My future goal is to become a game developer well-versed in the programming side of the physics used in mainstream game engines.

My wide range of skill help me become an asset in multiples areas and can help assist other on multiple departments, as well as being an indispensible worker due to my reach in skills.
